dcterms:creator: Emily Dinan
Stephen Roller
Kurt Shuster
Angela Fan
Michael Auli
Jason Weston
dcterms:description: In WoW, two participants take roles as a wizard and an apprentice. The wizard selects proper knowledge (sentence) from Wikipedia for the response. WoW split test set into Seen and Unseen based on topics.
dcterms:title: Wizard of Wikipedia (WoW)

dcterms:creator: Seungwhan Moon
Pararth Shah
Anuj Kumar
Rajen Subba
dcterms:description: OpenDialKG is a parallel corpus comprising open-domain dialogues and a knowledge graph. The reasoning path of each turn is annotated, enabling participants to utilize graph information during the conversation.
dcterms:title: OpenDialKG
